education.degree: Associate Degree in Computer Science & Information Technology

certifications: CAPM — Certified Associate in Project Management (Studying)
bio: Entry-level Project Manager with 13+ years of experience coordinating technical operations, gathering requirements, supporting enterprise customers, and collaborating across engineering, design, and business teams. Strong foundation in Computer Science, agile methodologies, cloud technologies, and workflow optimization. Skilled in translating user needs into actionable tasks, improving processes, and supporting cross-functional delivery. Currently pursuing CAPM certification to deepen project management expertise.
pmPhilosophy: Great PMs create clarity, reduce friction, and ensure teams can deliver. I believe in gathering requirements thoroughly, documenting clearly, and keeping stakeholders aligned through transparent communication. My approach is collaborative, structured, and focused on delivering measurable improvements.

coverLetter.body:
I'm excited to apply for the Entry Level Project Manager position at IBM. With over 13 years of experience coordinating technical operations, gathering requirements, and supporting cross-functional teams, I bring a strong foundation in communication, problem-solving, and project execution. My Associate Degree in Computer Science, hands-on cloud experience, and current CAPM studies further support my transition into project management.

In my role as Lead Technology Coordinator at Barr & Associates, I gathered user feedback, documented requirements, created knowledge-base content, and partnered with engineering and design teams to improve internal tools and workflows. I regularly translated customer insights into actionable tasks and supported small-scale project initiatives—work that aligns closely with IBM's focus on agile practices, design thinking, and cross-portfolio collaboration.

I'm drawn to IBM's commitment to innovation and its structured approach to project delivery. I would welcome the opportunity to support project teams, contribute to the Idea Hub, and help drive efficiency across IBM's project management processes.

Thank you for your consideration. I look forward to the opportunity to discuss how my background and growth mindset can support IBM's mission.

ibmHighlights: Experience gathering requirements and translating them into actionable tasks
Exposure to agile and design thinking practices
Cross-functional collaboration with engineering, design, and leadership
Track record of self-directed execution and attention to detail
Technical foundation from CS degree + 13 years of hands-on experience
